name: tele-net corp.
description: tele-net Coporation was founded in Japan in 1994. Their business has grown around their contact center operations. They do more than just handle order-taking and inquiries on behalf of their clients, by providing better individual communication through their services and customer contact operations which support our clients and the relationships with their customers
